h2_title: Where to use the Proto-Amourworm in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Here you can grow items, once you find enough Rice Cocoons within The Webbed Hollow, using the Seeds you collect throughout your journey.
promot:

The content is as follows:
Here you can grow items, once you find enough Rice Cocoons within The Webbed Hollow, using the Seeds you collect throughout your journey.
